creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
jya.com and www.jya.com no longer existing.
The BAWI is now reorganized and became a department of the "Staatssekretariat
fuer Wirtschaft" (SECO) and you can find it directly under
http://www.seco-admin.ch/e_index.html. I don't know which press release that
site originally was referring to, but linking to original source hopefully will
provide greater longevity of the URI-to-content-binding.

Thanks for your note.  That whole paragraph is no longer relevant since
mod_ssl was incorporated into the Apache Software Foundation, so I deleted
it.
creator: slive@apache.org
